cab.content:
(THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)
SECRET.
G.T. 3032.
WAR CABINET.
ZIONISM.
Copy of telegram from G.O.C. in C., Salenika to Secretary. War Office.
(Received 17th December, 1917)
A 1150 17 Aaa The following gentlemen Leone Gattegno, Director of the Practical School of Commerce, David Matalon, Deputy of Salonika, Jacob Iscages, Vice President of the Chamber of Commerce, E. Carmona Officer d'Academie, Members of the Jewish Congress of Salonika representing a Community of 80,000 Israelites, called to-day to beg me to convey to His Majesty their congratulations on the liberation of Jerusalem and their thanks for the declaration of His Majesty's Government.
General Milne, Salonika.
2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W.
19th December, 1917.
